website_summaries.verdict: If you're looking for shower shoes with some arch support, look no further.
pros: Made from Croslite with synthetic sole
Provides a little extra support since they are designed for walking
cons: The manufacturer recommends sizing down if you are between sizes

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: I needed arch support but if you have no problems with your feet it will work for you! I use them for shower shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Lucretia Marcum

customer_reviews.title: Crocs
customer_reviews.text: They were to big, felt like they were going to fall off. Just disappointed I thought crocs would be better. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... think that's why they are somewhat bigger than I'd like but they work and I'll keep them for the ...
customer_reviews.text: They are unisex shoes so I think that's why they are somewhat bigger than I'd like but they work and I'll keep them for the gym & pool.
customer_reviews.author: SOLwoman

customer_reviews.title: Loving It
customer_reviews.text: Soft. Comfy. Vibrant colour. Bought this one and another one in blue. One for home and one for the beach. Would buy again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Munz

customer_reviews.title: They last forever
customer_reviews.text: I bought a size or two too big. I'll still wear them though.
customer_reviews.author: jamie

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: We have always loved our Crocs....but, they manufacturer the flip flops different now and the quality is poor. This pair lasted 3 weeks and about 10 miles of walking and actually fell apart while walking. Disappointed in the new Crocs. Go back to the way you used to make them.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Ziebarth

customer_reviews.title: Size variables
customer_reviews.text: Have ordered other Crocs in the same size, but these are too wide and too long. I could water ski in them!
customer_reviews.author: Jacque Hughey

customer_reviews.title: the color is just like the pic
customer_reviews.text: the color is just like the pic, they are great
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: Unisex terrible way to order
customer_reviews.text: Very hard to order unisex flip flop. Tried twice using there standards . Always two big. I would not suggest anyone order unisex. And from Germany. What is with that.
customer_reviews.author: RANDY CAIN

customer_reviews.title: Loved the color but sadly
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a 7 but this style runs large on the top. Loved the color but sadly, had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They are the most comfortable flip flops that I own.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

product_meta.title: Crocs Men's and Women's Crocband Flip Flop | Slip On Sandals | Shower Shoes
product_meta.description: All Flip, No Flop! Sporty and lightweight with the signature athletic stripe, the Crocband Flip is a colorful and incredibly comfortable warm-weather choice that pairs perfectly with shorts, slacks or swimwear. Constructed of easy-to-clean Croslite material, it's ready for the beach, garden or anywhere else you choose to get your summer on!
feature_bullets: Sole sizes are US. Label shows UK. M = Men's W = Women's
The Crocs shoes will display US sizes
